targets.query:
from(bucket: "wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "wind_station" and r._field == "wind_avg_1m" and r.node_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "wind_station" and r._field == "gust_1m" and r.node_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "wind_station" and r._field == "dir_avg_1m" and r.node_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "wind")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "wind_station" and r._field == "battery_mv" and r.node_id == "1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
